attributes.action: Call for A National Breast Implant Register
attributes.additional_details: We call upon the government in light of the Poly Implant Prothèse (PIP) scandal which has affected over 50,000 women in the UK to implement a national breast implant registry, to help monitor any problems that occur and perhaps make it easier to trace people affected if there is ever a problem in the future.

rejection.details: This issue is covered by the existing petition PIP Implants - The way forward
